Mozilla Milestone 14 To Contain Crypto

29 Feb 2000

The next Mozilla milestone(M14) will include crypto code that will handle https(HTTP over SSL).

\n

The plan is to create an M14 binary that can be used to buy books, trade stocks, or anything else that requires SSL support.\n

\n

\nRead the full scoop on the News Server(requires a news reader) or on the Web through Deja.
